snippet: In its 2014-15 season, the Collegiate Chorale will offer “Not the Messiah (He’s a Very Naughty Boy),” an oratorio with a text by Eric Idle of Monty Python.
abstract: In its 2014-15 season, the Collegiate Chorale will offer “Not the Messiah (He’s a Very Naughty Boy),” an oratorio with a text by Eric Idle of Monty Python.

headline.main: Had Enough of Handel's 'Messiah'? Try Eric Idle's
headline.print_headline: Enough of One ‘Messiah’? Try One From Eric Idle
